questions.author: clayton
questions.question: why is the sky blue?
questions.body: ive always wondered why the sky is blue. is it reflecting the ocean? then why is it blue in the desert?

questions.author: clayton
questions.question: also why is grass green?
questions.body: not even trying to be metaphorical i just wanna know

answers.author: jenna
answers.body: no one knows why the sky is blue or the grass is green, it just is that way
